name: Break The Sky
description:
Break the Sky is a fast-paced arcade arena shoot-em-up, where you command, grow, and upgrade a fleet of resistance fighters against the invading Martian horde.

It was made within a week for AI and Games Jam 2021, and uses steering behaviours for the enemy and ally AI. It was built using Godot Engine v3.3, and all art and code was done by Sam Bigos.

How to play
  • WASD: Move - your fleet will follow your lead.
  • Left Mouse: Command your fleet to shoot towards the mouse cursor. Note: Fighters will not friendly-fire! After shooting, they will back off while reloading to allow others to shoot.
  • Right Mouse: Hold to enter 'shotgun' formation. This aligns your fleet in a narrower line which allows more to fire at once. It is also helpful for avoiding enemy fire.
  • K: Toggle between window sizes (960x540, 1920x1080, fullscreen).

You will encounter waves of enemies, after defeating each wave, you will be able to choose a perk which upgrades your fleet.

Survive as long as you can!
